column5: my lab ate a bait. the yellow eye is in the landmine he dropped.
Welcome to the wonderful wacky world of Labs!

Nice Pups fellas cute lil guys ,Gerritt my 21 Month old Rottie is still chewie,grrrrrrrrr the pine trim, the back leg of the lazyboy,the kitchen table,several cords and remotes,to top it off shes car sick so I cant bring her with me ,shes darn lucky shes very cute

holy crap man...why are ya feeding it so much? my full grown lab eats 3 measured cups per day with an extra 1/2 cup on very active days such as all day hunting. stick to the better quality foods that have much more beneficial nutrients for development. they cost twice as much but you feed half the amount as cheap foods so theres really no difference. feeding a puppy too much food is hard on their stomachs, makes house breaking harder, and can make them grow too fast...  as to the chew toys...  i have yet to see a large breed dog that doesnt love cow hooves. just make sure you get the black ones because they really stink and dogs love em. $1 each and they last days.

There's an old saying about goldens... The reason Golden retriever puppies are so cute is so you won't kill them. GR pups are absolutely hell untill they are two..then by five they kinda mellow out. Mine's not aware he is 8 this year. STILL very puppyish.

Try having a Golden, A black lab and a Husky(mix)  They have dug down as deep as the water pipe,went through doors,broken every cd and dvd in the house,move sofas 6 feet during their wrestling matches  But ya know what,they are always glad to see ya when you come home  One piece of advice,make sure you got lots of bones  The lab,make em retrieve as much as possible,burn his energy Golden,give em lots to chew Huskies.......... gets the dude's a harness,One I got she so cute, the devil hides inside She actually went through a door because I was not home,I found her comfort zone is having a cage for her while I am gone.She has adopted it like a safety area for her.When I found her on the highway in feb 08,she was skittish,still is so her anxiety turns to mass destruction. The crate has been a total relieve for her
another shot of the husky mix,my vet and I cannot figure out the other breed or breeds,possibly shepard Closest resemblance is Tamaskan
like marc t. says. un-conditional love. dogs are cool. they never hide whats up.. i run mine 1 hour every morning, rain or shine.

If the dogs figure out I'm off fishing and leave them behind. Look out! Waste cans in the house get dumped out and all the sheets pulled off the bed.. Gonna have to start loading the gear the night before. The cute and expensive stunt?  I empty my pockets every night onto the night table. The next morning I go to fill my pockets and my car keys are gone. Looked all through the house, the yard, inside the 2 vehicles and nothing. So off to the dealership to get a set of new key chips for the ignition lock (ouch). 2 weeks later the wife decides its time to clean out the puppy bed and wash their blankets. Guess what was buried under the blankets.  A Jack Russel is one very intelligent and mischevious dog.
I have counted my blessings.
Take them out fishing, run their pads off, then see how much damage they can go.   (Yeah ... Right)
Hey Gerritt maybe he knew you planning on going and chasing Cats around without him.

Does this look like the face of an angel or demon spawn..    Cute huh..  lets just say he is lucky I did not catch him in the act of doing this...    Yes... that is my trailer harness.... chewed to shreds...  Don't worry... no animals (even evil demon spawn dogs) were harmed in the making of this post..  G
" Marley and Me " comes to mind haha Cute dog tho
LOL...that's a great shot of the "demon"!!!  I can hear him now...wasn't me...it was that cat next door.  You believe me right????
One of those "who me??" faces  Jose
Funny you say that!... my GF keeps telling me we should have named him Marley LOL  G
Duct tape both ends - of the dog, I mean.  JF

never underestimate the curiosity of a puppy, my hunting dog once ate $260 cash when he got a hold of my wallet, i managed to piece togethar $40 with all the shreds of paper, hes also eaten my roe on several occasions, and chewed up some of my prized antlers.  My buddys puppy also ripped my fog light and cables off my truck..  stil cute? sometimes.
Ford.... the other, other white meat! LMAO! G, stop dipping the back of your truck in beef drippings... I'd say he's pretty lucky he's cute! HH
innocent until proven guilty!
OH the cursed thing... What demon from the depths of hell created the?!!  Your pup's expression is like:  You got a kibble in your pocket doncha?!  cheers HD
at least it wasnt something worse like gas line
PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFT!!! That's nothing, you got off lucky!!!! You could have come in to this!!!!!!  Cute Puppy!!!!    Cute Puppy Tornado Aftermath!!!!!
Some funny responses here.   I'd have to agree with Drifter and say you got of easy after seeing his pics.    Might want to keep a couple extra plugs around for the future though. Both are cute pups.
parents have a pup that looks just like that, last time I was there he spotted my brand new doc martens they lasted bout 15minutes  of puppy whirlwind

I am sorry G but I cannot stop laughing.....   Ahh puppies, they are too cute for words and yet there are so many words that come to mind when one discovers the mischief they have been up to.....  After seeing your picture and Drifter_16's.......I am reminded to give my dog an extra hug and Good Boy!  lol
I just got a PM from him. Says " Am I ever lucky ol' Gerritt hasn't needed the brakes yet. The front lines are out."
LMAO off Roy !!!!  Feed the thing G !!!! Get him some big bones to chew on .. something. Our lab never did any of that !

The thing does not stop eating! it has 100's worth of chew toys and gets 6 cups of food a day!... he is just a chewer! LOL..  I just think he is PO'd that I had him neutered last week! pay back is a pain!  G

Actually a fairly common problem. See it here quite often. All kinds of animals doing the dirty work. I fixed up a Honda CRV a month ago to drive. Took it to the cottage a couple times. Brought it in for an oil change last week and discovered a porcupine had chewed almost through the left rear brake hose. $50 bucks down the drain. geeez  O by the way. We went and got a new Golden last weekend.
heres the smirk my dog gives me when she knows she did something bad!  pork and pics are terrible for stunts like that bernie  as for your pup G maybe just a little demon involved!
i think i may have found a way to cure the dog G
Bernie... I was waiting for you to tell the masses!... (yes i saw it on FB..) cute pup! how is Alex handling things?  BassAssian.... LOL man that is funny right there!

story.. i woke up one morn around 4am , all i can smell is crappo.. iam sitting up in bed saying to my self that cant be.... head down the hall, look down stairs and the dog had about 6-8 loads of the run's...ahhhhhh 405am wife at top of stairs what the hell are you doing? she said i gave her a look that made here not ask and she went off to bed, what was i doing you ask, ya thats right 4am buster with a razor blade cutting the carpet out of the living room, i went around all the furniture and cut it out, it was soooooo runny it soaked into the plywood underlay!  ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh   needless to say after much investigation, i figured it out the KIDS fed the the dog tooo much leftovers from the night before ya thats right it was thanksgiving the day before and he had his helping of turkey and ham.....  dog for sale!  i think i walked around saying that for a mth or so!  lol
a lab could not do that. 2by4,s yes

What can I say Gerritt, I've lost two couches, numerous shoes and the inside of the door is chewed to pieces. You want solutions, try a muzzle, worked for me.    Something like this., just be sure you don't leave him unsurpervised. I now only have to threaten Brook with "muzzle" and she's off and sulking.
